org.jlinalg
Class LinAlgFactory<RE extends IRingElement<RE>>

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.LinAlgFactory<RE>
Type Parameters:
RE - the type of the elements in the vectors, matrices to be created.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LinAlgFactory<RE extends IRingElement<RE>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class provides a set of methods for generating various common types of matrices and vectors for an arbitrary RingElement type.

Author:
Simon D. Levy, Andreas Keilhauer, Georg Thimm
See Also:
Serialized Form

uniformNoise

public Matrix<RE> uniformNoise(int numberOfRows,
                               int numberOfCols)
Returns a Matrix of uniformly distributed random values. The kind of random values you get depends on the RingElement you use to initialize the LinAlgFactory

Parameters:
numberOfRows -
numberOfCols -

gaussianNoise

public Matrix<RE> gaussianNoise(int numberOfRows,
                                int numberOfCols)
Returns a Matrix of normally distributed random values. Values are taken from a Gaussian distribution with zero mean and standard deviation one.
Note! Normal Distribution Issue
For the following RingElement types this method won't achieve values of the correct distribution: F2, FieldP

Parameters:
numberOfRows -
numberOfCols -
Returns:
Matrix of normally distributed random values

public Matrix<RE> identity(int size)
